product_name: Outdoor Research Cirque Soft-Shell Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The women's Outdoor Research Cirque Soft-Shell Jacket is built for high-energy climbing and skiing in alpine environments. With a warm fleece backing, the highly breathable, wind-and weather-resistant double-weave, stretch-woven fabric excels in icy conditions. Rip-and-stick cuff adjustments, an internal stormflap backing the zipper and a drawcord hem work together to seal out the cold. Raglan sleeves allow unhindered shoulder movement. Outdoor Research Cirque Soft-Shell Jacket features an internal zippered pocket, zippered chest pocket and zippered handwarmer pockets. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Outdoor Research Cirque Soft-Shell Jacket is built for high-energy climbing and skiing in alpine environments.
